Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers

Class MinotaurController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.MinotaurController
public class MinotaurController
extends GodController
Extension of the GodController class that modifies the turn according to Minotaur's God Power.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • generateCard

      public Card generateCard()
      Sets all the attributes of the God Card Minotaur to their actual values.
      Specified by:
      generateCard in class GodController
      Returns:
      the complete Card

    • movePhase

      void movePhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the moving phase of the turn, allowing pushing away opponent Workers. If the Player chooses to move to a cell occupied by an opponent Worker, checks if it is unoccupied: if it's free, handles the pushing away of the opponent worker. Calls displayMove with a non-null Card parameter if the Minotaur God Power was used.
      Overrides:
      movePhase in class GodController
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • findPossibleMoves

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findPossibleMoves​(Cell workerPosition)
      Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels). Also allows the Worker to move to cells occupied by opponents (if they can be pushed away).
      Overrides:
      findPossibleMoves in class GodController
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a Worker can move
